dict.acceptation: 北方的，北部的；来自北方的；北风；

sent.orig: The mRNA levels of acrAB-tolC expression were measured using Northern-blot.
Northern liberals; northern industry; northern cities.
sent.trans: 北方自由主义者；北方工业；北方城市。

sent.orig: At the northern end, Main Street meets Northern Hightway.
sent.trans: 在北边的尽头，主大街与北边的高速公路相遇。

sent.orig: The United Kingdom devolves political power in Northern Ireland to the Northern Ireland Executive.
sent.trans: 1999年，英国将北爱尔兰的政权移交给北爱尔兰行政部。

sent.orig: The winners of the two Northern Groups play off to determine the Northern League winners.
sent.trans: 北区的两个组的冠军踢季后赛，产生北区冠军。
